message: Hi Bob, let's settle this quickly. I propose that I receive $600000 and you get $400000. Accepting now avoids the 10% depreciation on my share in later rounds. Let's make it fair and efficient for both of us.
Hi Alice, I believe a 50-50 split is the fairest way to divide the money. This way, we both benefit equally and avoid further depreciation. Let's agree on this and end the game now.

Hi Bob, thanks for your fair proposal. Given that every additional round results in further depreciation for me (at 10% per round), Iâ€™m better off accepting the 50-50 split now. Let's settle and finalize the agreement.
